lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Jill Manes, of Scarsdale, NY, Greenwich, CT, and Wellington, FL, died on March 29, at age 76 from ovarian cancer. Jill was a member of Sunningdale, Banyan, and Harmonie Clubs. She is survived by her husband Robert and her sons Ross and Jamie. Jill was a great mother and great friend. She led a full life that enriched the lives of those around her. She will be missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSEN, JILL MANES
